trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding that automatically adds the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Un endpoint standard con fisse <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref> automaticamente l'associazione che aggiunge il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Use this endpoint when you are writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service that is called from an ASP.NET AJAX application.
trans-unit.target: Usare questo endpoint quando si scrive un [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] servizio chiamato da un'applicazione AJAX ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> classe con specificata <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEndpoint"> </xref> classe con gli oggetti <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>
